scripts.tsc: npx tsc src/js/content.ts --outFile dist/js/content.min.js && npx tsc src/popup/popup.ts --outFile dist/popup/popup.min.js
scripts.min: npm run min:js && npm run min:html && npm run min:css
scripts.min:js: npx terser dist/js/content.min.js -c -m -o dist/js/content.min.js && npx terser dist/popup/popup.min.js -c -m -o dist/popup/popup.min.js
scripts.min:css: npx cleancss -o dist/popup/popup.min.css src/popup/popup.css && npx cleancss -o dist/css/content.min.css src/css/content.css
scripts.cp: cp src/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/images dist/
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run min && npm run cp
